text: Allakh napominayet lyudyam o sotvorenii chelovecheskogo roda i o vrazhde mezhdu rodom Adama i Iblisa. Allakh povelel angelam poklonit'sya Adamu poklonom, vyrazhayushchim privetstviye i uvazheniye.
